//Dynamic Programming Question 1
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int q,a[1000]={},ans[6]={},b[1000]={},i,j;
	cin>>q;
	a[5]=a[3]=a[2]=a[1]=1;
	a[4]=2;
	b[5]=5;
	b[4]=3;
	b[3]=3;
	b[2]=2;
	b[1]=1;

	for(i=6;i<=q;i++)
	{
		a[i]=a[i-5];
		b[i]=5;

		if(a[i-3]<a[i])
			{
				a[i]=a[i-3];
				b[i]=3;
			}
		if(a[i-2]<a[i])
		{
			a[i]=a[i-2];
			b[i]=2;
		}

		if(a[i-1]<a[i])
		{
			a[i]=a[i-1];
			b[i]=1;
		}
		
		a[i]++;

	}
	
	while(q)
	{
		ans[b[q]]++;
		q=q-b[q];
		
	}

	cout<<ans[5]<<endl;
	cout<<ans[3]<<endl;
	cout<<ans[2]<<endl;
	cout<<ans[1]<<endl;

}
